mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT (PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_INVENTORY, PRODUCT_DETAIL, PRODUCT_SOLD, PRODUCT_REGDATE) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(PRODUCT_ID),0) FROM "PRODUCT" p)+1, #{product_name}, #{product_price}, #{product_inventory}, #{product_detail}, #{product_sold}, #{product_regdate})
